full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 246 of 262 1957
LC8Cmax7 Rodgers - cross
1 wasn't she?
2 A. Yes.
3 Q. And she was separating from Epstein?
4 A. Yes.
5 MR. EVERDELL: Just a moment, your Honor.
6 THE COURT: Okay.
7 MR. EVERDELL: I just have a few topics, your Honor.
8 Okay?
9 THE COURT: Okay.
10 Q. Mr. Rodgers, slightly different question. You, I believe, received subpoenas for your flight logs as part of civil litigation in the past; right?
11 A. Yes.
12 Q. And you had to turn over your flight logs to the people who requested the flight logs; right?
13 A. Yes.
14 Q. Well, the flight logs were turned over to the FBI, but weren't they also turned over to plaintiffs' lawyers as part of a civil litigation?
15 MS. COMEY: Objection. Foundation.
16 THE COURT: Overruled. You may answer.
17 A. Yes, that is correct. I personally didn't, but my attorney forwarded, yes.
18 Q. I see. Your attorney produced those to the other side's attorneys who had requested them; right?
19 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00019108
